name: Martini Royale
description: A classic and refreshing drink for the summer.
directions: Fill the glass with ice cubes.
Pour the Martini, then add the Prosecco.
Use a spoon to turn the ice softly from bottom to top (2x only to preserve the bubbles).
Squeeze the lime in the glass and drop the wedge in the glass.
Take some mint and put it in one corner of the glass.
